score: The score gives a rough estimate of how well a debate is structured. The score is calculated through the various factors that Debate Wiz presents.
arg_units: Argument Units are extracted parts of sentences that have an argumentative value and make a statement.
linked_arg: Linked argument structures occur when 2+ arguments support or attack another argument linked together.
convergent_arg: Convergent argument structures occur when 2+ arguments independently support or attack another argument.
support_attack: Arguments can support and attack each other to either strengthen points already made or weaken them.
speaker_score: Speakers get scored individually based on the number of arguments they made and how well they were contributing to the debate's argument structure.
